page.title: 16EVENTS CHILDRENS COMP FESTVL
page.content: The children's annual eistedfod is held at Easter. In 1985 it was held on April 4. At 1.30 in the afternoon the singing and reciting comps are held for the 5-10 year olds, then at 6.00 competitions are held for those under 30 in singing, reciting, cerdd dant( which is a peculiar Welsh art pf singing pennillion to the accompaniment of a harp usually. One air is played whilst the singer has to sing a counter melody), piano playing, folk dancing, and a popular song. A chair was awrded to the best piece of prose, poetry, or drama on the subject of 'Celebrating' or 'Looking Forward'. Other comps can be completed at home, e.g. knitting and painting. Three judges adjudicate the winner in each section and money is awarded as a prize.
